TargetItem Properties

Requires: Base Development System

Inherits from ProjectItem. View the class hierarchy.

PropertyDescription
ApplicationThe application instance opened by the target to edit and run VIs. Details
Build SpecificationsReturns a reference to Build Specifications under the current target in the Project Explorer window. You can use this reference with the ProjectItem properties. Details
DependenciesReturns a reference to Dependencies under the current target in the Project Explorer window. You can use this reference with the ProjectItem properties. Details
